title: CASTLE ROCK Season 2 Episode 7 Breakdown, Theories, Easter Eggs, and Details You Missed! "The Word"
author: Think Story
comment: Sorry for the late video! I didn't even get to talk about the car from Christine in the parade. That was the car right?! Can't wait for next episode!
I had a physical reaction seeing Skarsgard! This episode was EPIC
The writers on this show are amazing - the way they skillfully connect s2 to s1 and all of King's works is phenomenal!  👏🏿👏🏿👏🏿

I saw how many shows you were taking on that are all blowing up right now and did not envy how much work it was going to be for you. 

So.... thanks for these well researched, entertaining, and thoroughly well crafted examinations of my favourite shows.

I'm so beyond in love with this show, it just really hits the right spot for me like only a few shows did so far, watching your videos after each episode wasn't necessary to me as I understood the plot BUT it was always good to have second view of the episodes and I really like the theories you come up with! 
Also I'm so happy my Boy is back haha it REALLY makes the last episode of season 1 make more sense and I can now say I enjoyed the last episode of season 1
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and review episode 7 "The Word" of Hulu's Castle Rock. We'll break down, review, and recap the episode while expanding on theories and Stephen King easter eggs!

Season 1 Episode 9 Breakdown:
